{"id":958389941,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1685201203,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/958389941/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Strength of a Group","memory":"42.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public long maxStrength(int[] nums) {\n        if(nums.length == 1) return nums[0];\n        int neg= 0;\n        for(int i: nums){\n            if(i<0) neg ++;\n        }\n        long ansoh= 0;\n        if(neg % 2 != 0){\n             Arrays.sort(nums);\n            for(int i = 0; i< nums.length; i++){\n                if((i != nums.length -1 && nums[i] <0 && nums[i+1] >=0) || (i== nums.length -1 && nums[i]<0) ){\n                    continue;\n                }\n                if(nums[i] != 0){\n                    if(ansoh == 0) ansoh = 1;\n                    ansoh = ansoh*nums[i];\n                }\n            }\n        }else{\n            for(int i: nums){\n                if(i != 0){\n                    if(ansoh == 0) ansoh = 1;\n                    ansoh = ansoh*i;\n                }\n            }\n           \n        }\n        \n        return ansoh;\n    }\n    \n    \n    \n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-strength-of-a-group","has_notes":false}
